modalities.speech: Jaime Guzman, a son of Mexican immigrants and high school dropout turned lawyer, is running for alderman to help people and continue his lifelong dedication to serving his community. He has spent over 15 years fighting for social justice and creating safe spaces, and now seeks to represent the 14th Ward with a commitment to serving the people, not personal gain.

children.caption: A political campaign poster features Jesus Garza, with a woman's voice urging viewers to vote for him. The video then cuts to a man standing on a snowy street, with the same woman's voice providing additional context.
children.summary: A man stands on a snowy sidewalk, gazing up at a house with a "VOTE FOR JESUS GARZA" sign, as a woman's voice urges viewers to support Jesus Garza. The scene transitions from a close-up of a campaign poster to a wider shot of the man on the snowy street.

Meanwhile, a man is seen running for alderman and a woman expresses gratitude for his support, amidst a backdrop of snowy streets and cityscapes. A man is seen walking on a snowy street.
